Uses of Interface
org.apache.commons.configuration.reloading.ReloadingStrategy

Packages that use ReloadingStrategy
org.apache.commons.configuration The Configuration main package.  
org.apache.commons.configuration.reloading The reloading package contains the definition of the ReloadingStrategy interface, which provides automatic reloading facilities for file based configurations.  
 

Uses of ReloadingStrategy in org.apache.commons.configuration
 

Fields in org.apache.commons.configuration declared as ReloadingStrategy
protected  ReloadingStrategy AbstractFileConfiguration.strategy
          Holds a reference to the reloading strategy.

Uses of ReloadingStrategy in org.apache.commons.configuration.reloading
 

Classes in org.apache.commons.configuration.reloading that implement ReloadingStrategy
 class FileChangedReloadingStrategy
          A reloading strategy that will reload the configuration every time its underlying file is changed. This reloading strategy does not actively monitor a configuration file, but is triggered by its associated configuration whenever properties are accessed.
 class InvariantReloadingStrategy
          A strategy that never triggers a reloading.
